com.stats
Class StatisticAppender

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      com.stats.StatisticAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler
public class StatisticAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton

This appender is used to extract statistical information from the logs.

Method Detail

append

protected void append(org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent logEvent)
Is called for each log event. Each log message is matched against regex in order to extract data.

Specified by:
append in class org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
Parameters:
logEvent - the log event

computeRRA

public void computeRRA(org.rrd4j.core.RrdDef rrddef,
                       long elapsed)
Add the appropriate RRA to the RRD database.

Parameters:
rrddef - The RRD database definition
elapsed - The length of the statistical session

init

public void init()
Init the appender and the RRD database for the current session. It is called at the end of each session. The RRD database is defined here.

close

public void close()
Close the appender and generates activity reports.

addLimit

public long addLimit(long time)
Add the amount of time specified in report.length to the parameter.

Parameters:
time - to which report.length must be added
Returns:
the addition result
